summary: The grandson of a legendary gentleman burglar assembles a team of thieves to steal a Cleopatran necklace from two parties - an ally-turned-rival, and an underworld tycoon.
cast: Shun Oguri|Jerry Yan|Tetsuji Tamayama|Gô Ayano|Meisa Kuroki|Kim Jun|Thanayong Wongtrakul|Yuka Nakayama|Kazutaka Yoshii|Shunichi Yamaguchi|Yayaying Rhatha Phongam|Kohtee Aramboy|Vithaya Pansringarm|Nirut Sirichanya|Geoffrey Giuliano|David Asavanond|Geoffrey Blaisdell|Hiro Hayama|Yû Yamada|John Schmidt|Anna Vasiunkina|Chindarat Kasuya|Sukhruethai Kowasakul|James Patrick Wales|Robert Vanderheyden|Margaret Roche|Natalya Senkina|Sahajak Boonthanakit|John Robert Wright|Carl Wolf|Charles Onken|Nuttapon Thamniyom|Chaniporn Suteerana|Juliya Kachetkova|Pongpat Sawtpong|Kenji Gôda|Wei Hou|Zijian Li|Yui Asou|Nick Tate|Tadanobu Asano|Monkey Punch|Markus Waldow
keywords: live action remake of anime|2010s|arsene lupin iii|arsene lupin|based on comic
title: Lupin y el corazón púrpura de Cleopatra
